pages.text: $(li)The River is a common biome that can serve as borders between various other biomes, and usually lead to $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This place is composed mostly of $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/clay_ball)Clay$(/l), Sand and, rarely, Driftwood logs.

$(li)Here you can find some water vegetation like Seagrass or Tall Purle Pickerelweed.$(br)$(li)Some aquatic animals like Salmons, Cods, $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/pike)Pikes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/lobster)Lobsters$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crocodile)Crocodiles$(/l), and rarely $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/platypus)Platypus$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)River$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
